overview_of_class:
Topics in the representation theory and cohomology of finite and infinite
groups, including compact and non-compact Lie groups.
name: Representation Theory
title: WCAS MATH 478-0-51 Representation Theory

Topics in the representation theory and cohomology of finite and infinite
groups, including compact and non-compact Lie groups.

subject: MATH
